Articles.Content:
I clearly updated my game, but when I did, it has no traces of the beta update, and stuck on 0.25 alpha.

I also noticed the game was getting stuck when loading the mk 3 fuselage, so I deleted them and everything worked.

I need some help with this junk.
I had a similar reaction, it updated fine but the mk3 stuff was not there. I recommend you to try to re downloading it from the website.
are you running x64 bit? if you update from launcher in x64 bit, it will update to 32-bit, which ruins your game, the only way to fix it is to reinstall it.

are you running x64 bit? if you update from launcher in x64 bit, it will update to 32-bit, which ruins your game, the only way to fix it is to reinstall it.

Well, i updated with the launcher, so i guess i should reinstall the game or the launcher?
Wait, found the problem. I used ksp launcher 64 bit. beta 64 bit is very unstable.
Ok, now i reinstalled the launcher, but it now gets stuck on the ion engine.
if u download 64 bit launcher and it says an update is available, DONT UPDATE!! it'll install 32bit and ruin ur game.
